files.patch:
@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2020, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.

@@ -756,1 +756,1 @@
-ZgcAllocationStall_TEXT_WARN=\nThere are {zgcAllocationStallCount} occurrence of Allocation Stall Events. Total time spent in waiting for memory to become available is {zgcAllocationStallTotalDuration} and the maximum duration is {zgcAllocationStallLongestDuration}. The rate of allocation stall per minute is {zgcAllocationStallPerMinute}.
+ZgcAllocationStall_TEXT_WARN=\n{zgcAllocationStallCount} Allocation Stall events observed. Total time spent in waiting for memory to become available is {zgcAllocationStallTotalDuration} and the maximum duration is {zgcAllocationStallLongestDuration}. Stall time rate per minute is {zgcAllocationStallPerMinute}.
@@ -759,1 +759,1 @@
-ZGCAllocationStallRule_CONFIG_INFO_LIMIT_LONG=The rate of ZGC Allocation Stall events needed to trigger an info notice
+ZGCAllocationStallRule_CONFIG_INFO_LIMIT_LONG=The ZGC allocation stall time per minute needed to trigger an info notice
@@ -761,2 +761,2 @@
-ZGCAllocationStallRule_CONFIG_WARN_LIMIT_LONG=The rate of ZGC Allocation Stall events needed to trigger a warning
-ZGCAllocationStallRule_RATE=Allocation Stall per minute
+ZGCAllocationStallRule_CONFIG_WARN_LIMIT_LONG=The ZGC allocation stall time per minute needed to trigger a warning
+ZGCAllocationStallRule_RATE=Allocation Stall time per minute

@@ -472,1 +472,1 @@
-AGGR_ZGC_ALLOCATION_STALL_COUNT_DESC=The count of ZGC Allocation Stall.
+AGGR_ZGC_ALLOCATION_STALL_COUNT_DESC=The number of ZGC allocation stalls.
